post:
Are you in need of more Storage Space? MyRoot.PW has the solution for you!
The MR5 Server Line now comes with double the RAM! 

MyRoot.PW offers Bare Metal Unmanaged Servers in central Europe
(Vienna/Austria). Delivery in less than 24 Hours!

C2550 (4c,4t)
~~8GB~~   16GB ECC RAM

=> 45 EURO per Month - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/index.php/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=6 "ORDER")
